786730.name: Super Bugman Extreme Ultra Demo
786730.description:
Congratulations! You have successfully found the Demo version of "Super Bugman Extreme Ultra"!

Enjoy playing a super stripped down version of the game! Play as Super Bugman in a special Demo level of the Story Mode (maybe even unlock a new character to play as); Try the Procedural level generator, but locked at difficulty 10; Experiment in the included Creative mode; Build using the two included tilesets (demo, earth) in the World Editor.

Also included is the free Steam Workshop Uploader tool (see community guides on useage); upload your creations to the Steam Workshop! Of course, the only way to play from the Steam Workshop is through buying the Full Version of the game (that's how I getcha!).
786730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
